The Poisson count model assumes that the reference values y
t are identically and independently Poisson distributed with a mean of λ (Eq. ( 1)). λ itself has a Gamma distribution as a prior (Eq. ( 2)). From Eqs. ( 1) and ( 2), the posterior predictive distribution is a negative binomial distribution (Eq. ( 3)).
